long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why TextCounter?

Have you ever needed to know the character count of selected text on a website? TextCounter is here to solve that problem! This user-friendly browser extension shows the character count of your selected text on any web page.

Key Features:

üéØ Quick and Accurate: Get the exact character count instantly!
üåê Works Everywhere: Compatible with most websites and web applications.

How to Use:

1. Highlight the text you want to analyze.
2. A small popup appears near the selected area, showing the character count.
